title: Roxane Gay
description: Samantha Bee sits down with Roxane Gay, The New York Times best-selling author of Bad Feminist, to discuss everything from fixing your own plumbing, to the problems facing the publishing industry, and dealing with Twitter trolls.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
